channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: tensorzero /tensorzero | Rust | 10,064
item.description: TensorZero is an open-source stack for industrial-grade LLM applications. It unifies an LLM gateway, observability, optimization, evaluation, and experimentation.

item.title: ansible /ansible | Python | 66,258
item.description: Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy and maintain. Automate everything from code deployment to network configuration to cloud management, in a language that approaches plain English, using SSH, with no agents to install on remote systems.https://docs.ansible.com.

item.title: socfortress /Wazuh-Rules | Python | 986
item.description: Advanced Wazuh Rules for more accurate threat detection. Feel free to implement within your own Wazuh environment, contribute, or fork!

item.title: weaviate /elysia | Python | 1,339
item.description: Python package and backend for the Elysia platform app.

item.title: pocketbase /pocketbase | Go | 50,435
item.description: Open Source realtime backend in 1 file

item.title: eriklindernoren /ML-From-Scratch | Python | 27,973
item.description: Machine Learning From Scratch. Bare bones NumPy implementations of machine learning models and algorithms with a focus on accessibility. Aims to cover everything from linear regression to deep learning.

item.title: trufflesecurity /trufflehog | Go | 20,571
item.description: Find, verify, and analyze leaked credentials

item.title: pedroslopez /whatsapp-web.js | JavaScript | 19,153
item.description: A WhatsApp client library for NodeJS that connects through the WhatsApp Web browser app

item.title: microsoft /PowerToys | C# | 123,187
item.description: Windows system utilities to maximize productivity

item.title: aquasecurity /trivy | Go | 28,370
item.description: Find vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, secrets, SBOM in containers, Kubernetes, code repositories, clouds and more

item.title: crewAIInc /crewAI | Python | 37,571
item.description: Framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By fostering collaborative intelligence, CrewAI empowers agents to work together seamlessly, tackling complex tasks.

item.title: rustdesk /rustdesk | Rust | 97,550
item.description: An open-source remote desktop application designed for self-hosting, as an alternative to TeamViewer.

item.title: LukeGus /Termix | TypeScript | 2,908
item.description: Termix is a web-based server management platform with SSH terminal, tunneling, and file editing capabilities.

item.title: bytebot-ai /bytebot | TypeScript | 4,689
item.description: Bytebot is a self-hosted AI desktop agent that automates computer tasks through natural language commands, operating within a containerized Linux desktop environment.
